function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Ultra-dense small cell networks may facilitate the spread of contagious diseases in indoor environments.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and outbreak in densely populated indoor spaces.","Mitigation":"Implementing strict hygiene protocols, ventilation systems, and spatial design to reduce close contact.","Technologies":"Advanced ventilation systems, air purification technologies, and spatial analytics for designing optimal layouts.","People":"Inhabitants of densely populated indoor spaces, such as office workers, students, and residents.","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, and architects."},{"Description":"High data rates for a large number of served users may lead to overcrowding in indoor environments, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","Impact":"Overcrowding and limited physical distancing, leading to a higher likelihood of disease transmission and outbreaks.","Mitigation":"Implement capacity management systems, staggered scheduling, and remote access technologies to reduce physical presence.","Technologies":"IoT sensors for occupancy monitoring, mobile apps for scheduling, and remote access tools for virtual interactions.","People":"Users of indoor spaces, including employees, customers, and visitors.","Owner":"Business owners, facility managers, and IT administrators."}]}
